title: 21: OBITCH Ghosted in Phasmaland...
description:
Listen up Geoffs! This week the duo takes on strange phobias and ghost sex. We’ve got obituaries for some dudes who loved to party and of course, some dumb.ass.criminalsssss let’s do this! 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Sponsors: 
StoryWorth.com/obit to save $10.00 on your first purchase! 

Sources:
